description: A React functional component named Hero that renders a two-column hero section with headline, body, call-to-action button, and an illustration image. It accepts props for customization and handles CTA click events.

methods.name: Hero({ title = 'Food Delivery', text = 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.', ctaLabel = 'CONTACT', illustrationSrc = '/assets/illustrations/hero-food-delivery.svg', onCtaClick })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a hero section with customizable title, text, CTA label, illustration, and click handler.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Inner function to handle button click events; invokes the onCtaClick callback if provided.

ctags.name: Hero
